The Richest Abramowitz Consumed 600 Million

Although he was thought to have a great loss in this financial crisis, this didn't preclude Abramovich's behavior of spending cash. 10 Actions That Will Impact Smudge to Your DC Shoes Hats According to the U.S. Forbes magazine's estimation, Abu now has only 6 billion US dollars of net worth. But the Russian oligarch spent 90 million U.S. dollars (about 610 million yuan) on a luxury house located on the French Caribbean island of St. Bart. This made this mansion with beautiful scenery one of the world's most expensive luxury department, while at the same time made people doubt his motive why he did big deals recklessly when he had a tight budget.Fashion Trend In Autumn and Winter of 2010: DC Shoes Hats

The mansion is close to the beach and formed by more than one cottage. Gifts of NFL hats at the Most Keen Price It does not only possess unrivaled sea views, but also the sports facilities such as tennis courts and swimming pools. According to reports, Abramovich bought the mansion from Jutes Singh, "This house has a long corridor, which makes you seem to be living on the beach," said Singh. 46-year-old Singh is one of the founders of the Art Technologe Group, he told the Wall Street Journal that he spent most of his day after his left the company in 2002, but now he wished to settle in Paris.

He said he purchased it in 2000 and not lose too much after he sold it. However, a spokesman for Abramovich declined to comment. Although it costed Abramovich millions of dollars, in the eyes of others, it is only one of his expensive toys. Right in this August it is whispered that Abramovich's girlfriend Zhukova is pregnant and the baby may be born in November. It is undeniable that Abramovich to his girlfriend always cherish more her. He ended his wife Irina of nearly 16 years of marriage in 2007, allegedly one of the reason is that he had fallen into love smaller than himself a nearly 20-year-old girlfriend.

Zhukova's father is a Russian billionaire, she graduated from famous school, and now her pregnancy made people know the fact clearly. Abu purchases the house in the luxurious resort which costs a large fortune at this time- does he have a consideration for his pregnant girlfriend? Perhaps only Abu themselves knows the answer. In recent years, Abu has spent a lot of money on personal consumption of luxury goods such as the money on the real estate and yachts which is an alarming number.

The luxury real estates under the name of Abu has be around Russia, the United States, Britain and other countries before. In addition, he also owns the world's largest private yacht, as well as English Premier League soccer. Abu stay London for a long time. In 2003, he bought Chelsea Football Club where even more to become the focus of his life. However, he gave up most of the property when divorced with his wife Irina in 2007. Abramovich likes yacht is an indisputable fact. His 115 meters long Pelorus and 86 meters long Ecstasea only switch back and forth in the Mediterranean.

While his latest world's largest 167-meter-long yacht-the Eclipse has entered the final installation stage and possibly could be delivered at the end of this year or early next year. In the aircraft investment, Abramovich is also generous; following the purchasing Boeing 767 converted into comparable to "Air Force One," a private horse, the last year of mid-September, and Abramovich then took out 300 million U.S. dollars. to buy the world's most advanced passenger aircraft A380 which made him be the first private millionaire who has A380.

Two years ago Abu bought Lucian Freud's work at the price of 33.6 million usd at a single swoop at Christie's auction house.It makes Freud's highest-paid living writer. After a day, Abu spent 86.3 million U.S. dollars on the British painter Francis Bacon's work, which is also the most expensive painting in the auction house by far.

The Commonsense of Coffee Latte

<p>Caffee Latte was classic mix espresso and milk. Buy on , Enjoy the best <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/nfl-hats/"; title="NFL hats">NFL hats</a> Italian also like drinking Latte for breakfast. How I Use Evernote to Organize Everything (25) The stove gets the sunshine ant the same time making the coffee and milk on it in Italian kitchen in the morning. Italians like Latte since they like milk rather than Espresso. Only coffee can make the usual milk marvelously tasteful. With the gentle flavor of milk, the original bitter coffee becomes smooth, fragrant, sweet and intense, even people who are not used to drinking coffee also can not hold off the amazing taste of latte.</p><p>When you Italian Latte, you need a small cup of Espresso and a cup of milk in which the milk is more than coffee. It is very different to the Capuchino. It is easy to make Latte, that is to pour the nearly boiled milk into the Italian concentrate coffee which just be finished. In fact, there are no regulations for how much milk added. You just do it according to your preference. If you put some labeled cold milk foam into the hot milk, it become American Latte. American Starbucks latte is made in this way with the bottom of the Italian espresso, the middle heated to 65 ~ 75 ? milk and finally a layer cold milk foam of no more than half a centimeter. If you do not put hot milk on it and directly put two big spoons of foamed milk on the espresso, it will be the Italian macchiato.</p><p>Olay can be regarded as European latte, different with American or Italian latte. Ole coffee is made as follows: pouring a cup of Espresso and hot milk into a large cup and then adding two spoons of foaming cream. The greatest difference between Olay and American or Italian latte is that the synchronicity of espresso and milk. The milk and coffee encounter in the first time, colliding leisure and free feeling. French is the most enthusiastic supporters of Olay coffee, and you will see a round belly Olay Cup with their day containing a source of good mood when you enter the breakfast table in France. Interestingly, the cup used for holding Olay coffee by French may be the biggest one compared to all other coffee cups. The difference between Latte and Ole is also that in Latte, milk is heated mechanically, while in Ole, milk is heated by fire. However, the tastes of these two coffees are the same gentle and moist, with dense milk fragrance and coffee flavor.</p><p>Icy latte coffee increases the proportion of milk by mixed candy and milk to make it not mix the lighter coffee with two layers of black and white colors forming the visual effect as graceful as cocktail. Finally, putting the ice together, a whole cup of coffee giving a warm feeling of elegance and romance.</p>

Bill Gates' Alms Offering : From A Miser to Top Charitarian

<p>One time, Melinda walked on the inanimate town, the stores on the two side of the narrow street were nailed with board as a dead city. 5 Fabulous Tricks for <a href="http://www.ukchristianlouboutins.co.uk"; title="christian louboutin">christian louboutin</a> In the outdoor market, a few women were selling no other things except scanty vegetables. Famous <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/nfl-hats/"; title="NFL hats">NFL hats</a> On Fire Melinda apprised some women walking by, checking whether they wear shoes. The result is depressing: they were all bare-footed. Melinda` boyfriend Bill Gates who came with her couldn`t believe his eyes. At that time, he who at the age of thirty-eight had already own a billion dollar never thought that there were someone who had no shoes on the earth. However, Gates's compassion was only slightly aroused, yet he didn't put it into action. His profligate character still didn't change much. Gates at that time was still very stingy.</p><p>The year of 1994 was his delightful and sadness year. On this New Year's Day, he married with Melinda. In the same year, his mother, he loved deeply, was die for cancer unhappily. The huge change gave Gates a big shock both on his feeling and spirit. The worldwide richest man began to consider the meaning and direction of life. This year, he took out 94 million dollar to build William H. Gates Foundation which is the former The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation the under his father`s proposal. However, the American public only noted in 1995 Gates's wealth had already risen to 12.9 billion dollars, yet his almsdeeds were rarely mentioned.</p><p>The real turning point appeared in 1997. September this year, the USA defaulted in the membership bill for the UN up to billions of dollars, made the impoverished UN on the brink of bankruptcy. The founder of CNN Ted Turnner had prounced surprisingly that he would donate one billion for United Nation for the financial crisis and some other developing aiding projects. American presses had reported on the charity behavior on the obvious place. Turnner was described as the leader in the charitable men in new generation of America. Some newspapers even listed the personal wealth of the major U.S. magnates and the amounts of their donations, and went on to accuse Gates as the world's richest man could be so stingy.</p><p>Under the media rendering, more and more people asked Gates to donate money and contribute to the community, they then grew into a powerful social stress. But to Gates, everyone has his own way to contribute to the community, Microsoft creates tens of thousands of jobs, promote the prosperity of high-tech industry, led the U.S. economy active, is not it a contribution to the society? In 1998, when Gates was confronting with Microsoft lawsuit and suffered great pain, the New York Times posted that 90% disease happen in poor countries but only 10% health care resources are divided to people in these countries. This passage recalled the Gates couple`s experience of traveling in African in 1993. Since then, Bill Gates` funding organization`s key point turned to the area of healthcare.</p><p>Gates' charity moves climbed just like his wealth. He planed to donate more than 100 billion dollars which he owned according to his calculations at that time, leaving each of his children only 10 million U.S. dollars, the contributions were mainly to be used for helping those patients who were affected by AIDS and malaria. The foundation of Bill and Melinda started working in the basement of the old home of Gates. It moved into a two floor house in Seattle later. The foundation had 216 workers, including children health consultants, public health management experts, lawyers and finance staffs. It is said that Gates will have 10 hours to handle the things of foundation in every week. Gates once said to his employees in public that in recent years, he gained largest fulfillment from engaging in the cause of improving the world`s equality. He thought that extremely significant.</p>

Big Ten Great Ads of His Airness Part ?

<p>The fifth, Gatorade drink: This is an advertisement shot by Jordan at the end of his athletic career for this kind of beverage. 10 Reasons for You to Choose <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/dc-shoes-hats/"; title="DC Shoes Hats">DC Shoes Hats</a> The plot is: Jordan who is nearly 40 and the 23 Michael Jordan appear in the same ground. The Jordan who is more mature and farsighted still wants to prove that he can run and play as well as when he was 23 years old. When the two Jordan was drinking the Gatorade drink to have a rest on the bench, another version of Jordan appeared. Jordan who wears a jersey of North Carolina University, challenges two airmen on the bench: "Who's next?"Hey Journalists! Keep Away from <a href="http://www.nbajerseyshop.org/"; title="nba basketball jerseys">nba basketball jerseys</a> ! </p><p>The fourth Chevrolet car: Jordan seives a basketball in his hand, leaves the arena and walks towards his red Chevrolet. Why Gwyneth Paltrow all Like <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/nfl-hats/"; title="NFL hats">NFL hats</a> ? Who Knows! Two small fans closely follow him. One of them asks: "Is that your car?" Jordan answered, with a confident and proud tone:"Yes!" Later, the air lean out from the skylight of his red Chevrolet, releasing the basketball from a distance of 15 feet.</p><p>No. 8 McDonald`s: Both Jordan and the "Big Bird" Larry Bird appear in this classic advertisement, but their contest place is the Super Bowl football stadium rather than the NBA arena. The prize for the winner is the Big Mac hamburger and french fries. In the end, although the audience did not get answer that "Who has won the game at last?". But this scene also make them can not help laughing. Jordan dresses just like a playboy who is killing time in Hawaii, which win some extra scores for his commercial.</p><p>2. Nike: in 1987, Nike thought about designing a unique commercialsa ad for Jordan who was close to peak. 1 year later, the tentative idea became reality. The black director Spike Lee directed this advertisement. And he filmed as a role of "super fan of Jordan": "Mar" Blackmon. Blackmon constantly asked Jordan the questions that he was interested in, and even thought that he has found the secret of his success: "It must be the shoes you wear now!" the 23 denied with a smile. This advertisement immediately caused a shocking effect and became an essential collection in the bedroom of youngsters who are about 10 years old. The ad pictures have begun to broadcast on television again not long after Jordan retired in the 3rd time.</p><p>The first Gatorade drink: In1991, Jordan became the first player brand ambassador who was selected by Gatorade drink. This is thought to be one "shot" of the latter's. Under the influence of Jordan charm, Gatorade not only dominated in the sports drinks industry, but also the concept "the same as Michael" they have set up has gone deep into the hearts of the people.</p>

Ten Amusing Customs In Wedding Worldwide

<p>Wedding, this sacred moment, it will be the most beautiful memory for each couple. Do You Know How <a href="http://www.nbajerseyshop.org/"; title="basketball jerseys">basketball jerseys</a> Prevail? A Horrible Number! Therefore, people all over the world commemorate this moment by their most unique way. <a href="http://www.ukchristianlouboutins.co.uk"; title="christian louboutin shoes">christian louboutin shoes</a> Gifts for Women Indian wedding: just for worship. In the point view of Hindu, the primary purpose of marriage is to complete all the religious duties, in which worship is the most important part. Only male marries and has son can he get the qualification to offer sacrifices to the gods. Therefore, in the wedding ceremony, new couples need to spell, pray and pledge for each other.</p><p>The husband often says clearly to his wife, "I marry you only in order to have a son." And priests as well as other people wish them the best for that. Danish wedding: Carrying on secretly. What surprises us is that it takes a couple of days to prepare for a wedding which is held secretly. It is because that holding wedding openly will enrage the ghosts or arouse their envy. Nearly at the end of the celebration, people present will carry a great altar of beer into the garden. After the bride and groom smashed jars, the marriageable women at present would pick up debris, the woman picked up the biggest piece is destined to marry firstly.</p><p>German Wedding: smashing bowls and jars to pursue lucky. Everyone of the guests being invited to attend the wedding carry a few broken bowls, broken dishes, broken plates, broken bottles and the like items. At the ceremony, they will throw the dishes to the ground, believing this will help the couple get rid of the past troubles and begin their sweet life.</p><p>In the long road of life, the couple could always stay the fierce love, and get together to the end. French wedding: simple but romantic. Before the marriage ceremony, there is a simple Engagement. Usually the woman's parents host the man's parents, brothers and sisters, and would also invite other relatives, and even one or two friends who attend.</p><p>The wedding has also been gradually simplified. But it is still the most solemn family festival, with the solemn and sacred color. The wedding ceremony is often hosted by the mayor or his deputy, often at a specific time, and then to banquet guests. Japanese Wedding: Traditional Taoist. In the traditional Taoist wedding ceremony, people in Japan worship kami which is a god existing in nature. In the wedding, the priest prays to the god to bless the new couple. The last item of the ceremony is "sip green wine", that is, the wedding party to share rice wine in the three flat cups.</p><p>The three cups are put from the bottom to the up, the groom pick up the first cup, sip 3 wine, and then give it to the bride. The bride also takes three mouthfuls of it and then passes it to the guests. And then in turn drink the second and three cups in the same way.</p><p>Wedding ceremony in Finland: a combination of tradition and modern. The wedding ceremony for the Finns is both creative, they have cakes, and traditional, they splash rice which is an important custom for them. Modern wedding can be described as a combination of classical and romantic. Luxury wedding car is decorated with tin cans so that produce sweet sounds, and the groom should take the bride across the threshold.</p><p>For the modern Finns, these are the real tradition, they convince that a traditional wedding will be the best blessing of their marriage.</p>

Secrets to Guide Kids Not Lie

<p>Many parents will be very angry and mad when they find their kids have the habit of lying, it is more than the lies themselves, it is about the tendency that the kids refuse to admit that they have lied. Anniversaries Gift Ideas for Friends If we really face to this circumstances, on one hand, we smack and scold them after they tell lies. On the other hand, it is important to calm down and think over why is it like that. Because after all we should admit a theory-no one would lie for no reason.Lying is actually a complex mental work, nobody would do it carefully without any payment.How I Use Evernote to Organize Everything (25) </p><p>Why do the children lie? When we recall our children life, when do it begin? Generally because we are afraid. The Ultimate Trend Bible to <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/dc-shoes-hats/"; title="DC Shoes Hats">DC Shoes Hats</a> Sales Later we discovered that this could solve psychological pressure well and we were all happy. So we became accustomed to it. Also, to form this habit is very fast and does not need to be slow. We look at our own little baby then. They sometimes because they are not allowed to tell the truth. After all, something wrong have been done. Don't admit could withstand at least a while. Theoretical speaking, lying is better than confessing, and I guess that you will consider your kid a coward if he surrenders and confesses after having done something wrong, right? So under many circumstances, kids will think that it is actually a cool thing to lie. On the other hand, many parents subjectively treat the matters of their children which is based on the same starting point: What can a child understand? So they decide the whole issue by their own subjective judgments. More often children are actually very smart and soon be able to understand what you want to hear, so next time they will say as you want to hear. Therefore, there comes a problem: what we prefer? Ourselves or the truth? People who prefer themselves also tend to judge things subjectively, for example, they will tell their kids it is not hurt to get a shot and there is no pain to have pills. However, the nature of kids is relatively pure and innocent, what they do most in their childhood is studying and learning, and they will remember whatever they are taught.</p><p>Therefore to make your children have a correct attitude, you have to be correct in your position. For example, some parents will send their children to make someone who the parent is unwilling to see away by asking their kids to tell that he/she is not in. sometimes, kids are also involved to deliver messages between patens. In fact, in that context, there is no right or wrong in the events themselves, but the adults should at least take some time to tell the children why they do that. Unfortunitely, most parents feel it bothered.</p><p>I believe now you can spot the clue. The key to solve lying is: first, believing the fact; second, unified standards. Another meaning of to believe the fact is to be patient to listen to the children.No matter what he says, just be patient and listen, if he is really lying, you should also listen to him until he can't make his story sound plausible. If he can justify himself, people can discuss with him slowly. Children normally don't mind of this discussion. Actually, kids all have desire to express themselves, you should give him a chance.</p><p>What is important again is that the parents should believe the children and do not give them some implication or induction. For example, if your child beat a child of someone else, you say to your child yet, "He just cry while you don't beat him, right?" It directly leads to your children`s dependence and the absence of responsibility. Without taking responsibilities there is noting I will be scared of. All in a word, mental motive to have lies to defend oneself should not be spurred by parents` deeds and words. Neither it is right to provide chances for their lies. Having found children told lies, we should not response with reprimand and punishment, but explain to the children with the existing facts, so that children know and feel no need to lie to us.</p>

Issues Not End the Passing Away of Michael Jackson

The legal dispute, between Allgood entertainment company with New Jersey-based headquarter and Michael Jackson `s performance deputy AEG and his broker Frank Dileo ,didn't end with his death according to media. Allgood adjusted its statement on count and asked compensation from the former 40 million dollars to 300 million dollars. Here comes another coveter for the heritage of Michael Jackson.Recession Chic â€[ How to Be Most Cool-Looking on a Budget

Before Jackson died,AllGood Entertainment suited to New York Federal Court by alleging that they have an agreement with his agent Frank Dileo. 4 Beauty About cheap mbt shoes According to this agreement, jackson would not preparing for another concert before his performing in the U. Hey Ladies! How Can You Resist the Charm of Wedding New Era Hats S. But Jackson had already signed the agreement with AEG, plan to perform 50 times in London in July, 2009. The spokesman from that company said,the planned concerts in London had violated the agreement between the company and the broker Dileo,asking Jackson,AEG and Dileo for $40 million claim

At present, Allgood revised the plaint that added two defendants, Jackson's heritage manager John Brnca and John McClain and increased the amount of claim from original 40 million soared to 300 million. When asked about why there is such a leap in the amount of its claim, the company said they never thought Jackson would be death, and will be issued to Jackson London concert rehearsal video as the material of the film. It showed that they want to get large profit from Jackson and his heritage.

There were more lawsuits when Jackson alive, it will be enough for his heritage after his death. Michael Jackson left a large heritage after his death, and original plan to held an auction of his personal belongings in the Julian auction abruptly terminated. The move for the property custodian and Julian Jackson, the auction house has incurred a sum of the amount of five million dollars in claims. A memorial collector named Richard Lapointe has attended auctions for Jackson's personal belongings for many times and has bided for many items this time. Lapointe thought that it's due to his highest bid price that stopped the auction activity in Julian, if the auction continued he surely could obtain more heritage of Jackson's.

I lost 300 matches. I have experienced failure, failure and failure. That`s why I succeed."</p>

Ten Mental Will Ruin Your Career Life

<p>Through this training courses of mind born again, feedback, according to my personal feeling and summarized below 10 formed to ruin personal life of 10 concrete mentality, below listed for reference. Top brands Crafts of <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/red-bull-caps/"; title="red bull hats">red bull hats</a> Its goal is to find and confirm the soul of the mindset training courses as well as to reduce obstacles to gain phasal success in advance. Facing endless works and complicated human relations, we sometimes are confused about our career and are unsatisfied because of small matters which affect our emotion in work and life. People are in the workplace and they must participate in social interaction, social scope has great relation with each occupation, hobbies, lifestyle and geographic location. In real life, some people don´t make friends in the social life, or made friends for not long time who left him, and the relations of his colleague is not usually harmonious.Recession Chic â€[ How to Be Most Cool-Looking on a Budget</p><p>The reason is that, the adverse social psychological state of mind has hindered the normal development of interpersonal relationships, that is the kind of diseasesocial psychologists are always talking about---morbid social psychology. 4 Beauty About <a href="http://www.mbtshoesale.org/"; title="cheap mbt shoes">cheap mbt shoes</a> There are several most seen manifestations and you should try your best to avoid having: NO.1 The sense of self-abasement: some people will easily have the sense of self-abasement and even contempt themselves. They are lack of confidence, have no courage to deal with problems, have too many fears, echo what others say and don't have their own judgement. If this kind of mentality not be conquered, it will abrade the unique personalities. 2: Cowardice: This mainly can be found form those people who do not know this society too well and is shy and not good at speaking. Because of cowardice, though they think they are right in their social life, they will not express their ideas after the consideration. People can find this psyche and they finally have opinions about themselves and will not be good friends. 3. Psychology of suspicion: Someone entrusts friends with things in social interaction but often examines the other party with distrust, suspects him without reason, makes groundless accusations and irresponsible remarks. For instance, someone entrusts a friend with a matter but asks other about what the friend has said when he is underway. As a result, the relation between friends is impaired.</p><p>NO.4 Reversal mind: some people like to argue for the sake of arguing to indicate that they break the mould. For everything no matter what it is, they like to say no or bad when you say yes or good to make others be disgusted with them. Fifth play psychology: some people look making friends as flirtation, fickle.inconstant, always coping, boastful, loving that beautiful words, and a person say how deep contact with someone when he first met someone. This human interaction is only superficial and he has not deep feeling friend. 6. Avarice psychology: Someone thinks that making friends is for [mutual use". He only makes friends with those who are useful and can bring benefits to him and often kicks out them after their services are no longer needed. This kind of poor psychology to hanker after money and gains and benefit from others will have his moral qualities impaired. 7, Ignore psychology: some people in all kinds of things, just as unconcerned with indifference, it, or wrong to think that speech is aloof attitude and sharp personality, and not to oneself, others to lose some friends. Eighth, the psychology of complaining: if an employee complain about this, that and everything in his work, then he probably won't place his work at the most important position, if there is any methods or ways he can apply to ease his complaint</p><p>he will have great interest to try, so it will destroy the efficiency of his own job. Every successful organization will spare no effort on reducing their employees' complaint. Ninth, the psychology of muddling along: they hold that muddling along is their policy, they lounge around and do nothing concrete, waiting for the day to be over, they don't pay much attention to the work they do, when it if finished they would be relieved, soon they will find that they have achieved nothing over the long period of time. Tenth, the psychology of arrogance ( the source of why many people could become as successful as others): to say it is simple and obvious is because almost everyone knows about it, you can understand the meaning by simply looking at it; say it is complicated because the harsh lessons of "modesty benefits and arrogance leads to defeat" are everywhere, however, there are still a large number of people making the same mistakes.</p><p>In our daily life, those who are extremely proud of themselves always think that they are superior to others, considering them being perfect and others are not as good as they are in terms of every single aspect, they are likely to be very happy and nice to you when you compliment them and on the contrary, if you criticize them, they would lose their temper and become angry with you; this kind of people are stubborn and inclined to stress that their view is correct and reasonable and anyone else's opposite view is wrong and unreasonable. They usually feel good about themselves and are relatively conceited, they always think that they can do anything and on the other hand, others are not able to do anything; they treat people rudely and lacking coutesy, they don't know how to respect others, how to understand others and they like show their position and power in front of others. The reasons to form the pride psychology can be divided into objective and subjective. Objective: the people with pride psychology generally have an advantage. For example, more intelligent, outstanding, the family is superior, or they have a certain expertise, qualifications and achievements and so on.</p><p>The subjective aspect: the excessively high self-assessment. Especially for those people who have high educational experience and possess some skill and achievement, they are easily intoxicated with their own advantages and forget their shortcoming. They will be self-satisfied when thery receive sincere and baleful paise so as to lose their sensible, consider everybody and everything beneath their notice and be arrogant. Self- satisfaction is a feature of bad personality which is egoist, ignorance of others and character of unable to be with others equally. This is completely harmful to the development of oneself. Because people with self-satisfaction are too confident that they do not like to accept others` help and because of their pride and ignorance of others, it is difficult for them to have a close cooperation with others or even will have problems with others when they need to complete a task with others. And at ordinary times, to overestimate their weaknesses, which should be blind not to overcome shortcomings overcome, a serious illness, he dragged into disease, affect their career development and growth progress.</p>

The Feeding About Lark

<p>From the material point of view, most of lark's cages are made of bamboo, and certain ones are made of hard wood, and from the appearance point of view, the tube cages contain vault-type short ones, dome-type high ones, flat-topped short ones, among which, the flat-topped short ones are used most. Significant Ways to Defend the Blemish of your <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/red-bull-caps/"; title="red bull hats">red bull hats</a> The flat short cylinder-cage is usual 21-33cm high, 30-38cm in diameter of bottom, 0.2-0.3 in diameter of splints and has splints with 1.2-1.5cm distance in between. This cage has small size, light weight and it is easy to carry. Vault-type cage has variety of types and has different sizes. The most common high is about fifty centimeters, the bottom is about thirty centimeters in diameter, the space of cage is large and is relatively free, but is uneasy to carry.Sketch out the Reasons of the Popularity of <a href="http://www.newerahatsale.com/monster-energy-hats/"; title="monster energy hats">monster energy hats</a> </p><p>There is another kind of super big arch topped tube cage with 1m high and 50cm in diameter. Birds can do fly performance inside. This kind of cage can't be carried with hand but only with shoulder pole. There is no perching stick in a lark's cage, only a fungiformed circular truncated cone in the center of the bottom. This is the stage for the lark to sing and dance.</p><p>Why is there a round table shaped like a mushroom? The reason is that, for a long time, lark lives in dissert and grassland where it loses the ability of climbing, as a result of which it has to stand on a platform to sing or dance. The height and diameter of the platform should be decided by the bird's age and body size. Generally, it is about 13-16 centimeters high and the diameter is 4.5-6 centimeters. The table-board should not be too smooth on which you could affix some coarse sand or you could also make some stripes on it with the help of a file. Lark's cage at the bottom should be covered with a layer of sand. Because Lark long lived in the steppe and desert areas, used to sand bath, In addition, as the needs of the stomach muscles can also peck the sand.</p><p>Of course, the sand should be clean. You should handle them before changing them. The way is that you use a sieve of comparatively larger holes first in order to get the silver sand. Then you wash the sand with water, followed by scour with no poison. The last step is to wash the sand with clean water again and put it under the sunshine until it is dry. The thickness of the sand in the bottom of the cage should be 1.5-2.5 centimeters. The lark also needs to be enveloped. In order to exercise the bird`s guts and mostly does not cover the shroud while outing, but the weather is unpredictable, it is better to cover it when it rains or snows.</p><p>In the evening, a cover could prevent incidents, for example damages from cats, mice and mosquito and so on. In winter, it can keep the temperature. The cage cover should be suitable which is neither tight nor lose. The one made of pure cotton is the best. In addition, it also needs a water tank and a drink tank, you should choose tanks with large orifices relatively as food tank and drink tank. The food tank and drink tank should be placed appropriately, generally 8 to 10 cm away from the cage bottom. Beside these, some tools should be increased , such as food Kei, manure shovel, long-handled manure Kei screen, injection devices, suction devices, water brush and long bamboo tweezers. Larks' feed: the subsidiary animal feed is of wide range, and almost all insects can be their feed. The most feds include the following things: locusts, tenebrio molitor, cricket,young cicadas, spiders, as well as mayflies and pine moth larvae, etc.</p><p>The problems should be noticed when feeding the skylark: do not give the bird dirty food and not fresh water, and do not let the skylark touch sick bird or the bird having the parasite, and do not always put the skylark at the same place. Don`t cover the cage bottom with unclean or wet sand, not let the bird close to other birds when showing the bird, cure the sick bird, and not make the bird stay at home not breathing the fresh air for a long time </p>
